entry.title: Sunday: Light snow. Temperature falling to minus 21 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Light snow ending early this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind north 30 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 21 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 9:00 AM MDT Sunday 23 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 24. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 9:00 AM MDT Sunday 23 April 2023
